comments.body:
> It is not required to set one, unless you want to use this graph for as your scrollbar's graph and need to indicate which graph should be used.

If it's not required use
`id?: string`

since this is a technically a major version upgrade, can you move the old version into a different folder. see https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#i-want-to-update-a-package-to-a-new-major-version

Hi @mhegazy 
thanks for your feedback, but due to this one shipped already with #22150 and I am completly unaware, which version was previously supported, I couldn't even tell, if this is a major update. The added version number follows improvement suggestions from @micksatana and should provide information which version is supposed to be supported by now and in future. If from now on major version changes come, I will follow your instructions.
For adding the version number to the unknown state, I hope it is ok, to not have the unknown state any longer?
